title: decentrasoft
author: decentrasoft
created_time: May 09, 2022, 09:36:33 AMLast edit: May 25, 2022, 05:36:35 AM by decentrasoft
content: Greetings all,I would like to announce that we are providing all kinds of software development services. We are a team of 42 developers based in Bulgaria and we are in the software outsourcing market since 2016. Bellow you can see part of our portfolio which can be shared without an NDA. If you need any kind of software to be developed, any scripts for trading or automation of different processes feel free to contact us.You can see the technologies we are experts with here:https://sftdx.com/Our portfolio can be seen here:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UL1Ul38oVEVSju6QxuLrSmjywGJtAKNH/view?usp=sharingYou can contact us via:office@sftdx.comOr DM us here, we are online

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: why would you upload your pdf portfolio on some random file hosting site and not google drive?One can easily inject a RAT in pdf. Fishy AF. Reported.

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: edgycorner on May 24, 2022, 02:02:55 PMwhy would you upload your pdf portfolio on some random file hosting site and not google drive?One can easily inject a RAT in pdf. Fishy AF. Reported.Edited the first post. Here is the google drive linkhttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1UL1Ul38oVEVSju6QxuLrSmjywGJtAKNH/view?usp=sharing

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: decentrasoft on July 17, 2022, 04:50:22 AMOur portfolio can be seen here:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UL1Ul38oVEVSju6QxuLrSmjywGJtAKNH/view?usp=sharingThis file is pathetic, and if it proves anything, it gives the impression of the lack of experience in your developer team. I thought the GitHub links, GitLab or anything that proves their expertise and not just a paper with the names of people and the programming languages they are good at.I wish you luck, but that's not how things work.

We are a team of 42 developers based in Bulgaria and we are in the software outsourcing market since 2016. Bellow you can see part of our portfolio which can be shared without an NDA. If you need any kind of software to be developed, any scripts for trading or automation of different processes feel free to contact us.You can see the technologies we are experts with here:https://sftdx.com/Our portfolio can be seen here:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UL1Ul38oVEVSju6QxuLrSmjywGJtAKNH/view?usp=sharingYou can contact us via:office@sftdx.comOr DM us here, we are onlineQuote from: Husires on July 17, 2022, 08:25:23 AMThis file is pathetic, and if it proves anything, it gives the impression of the lack of experience in your developer team. comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: whiteonar on August 19, 2022, 01:56:40 PMIt's not a bad thing that you have such a portfolio. I am interested in how adaptive your software is with other software. We are currently using hyper automation from Gartner in our small company. It prevents us from worrying about inventory levels and supply tracking. So I would like to know more about the capabilities of your software to interact with already pre-installed software. There are a lot of offers on the market right now for scripts in commerce. To take a worthy place in this row, you need to offer something extraordinary, able to interest a potential buyer. I hope you have something similar.As we are in the business from a long time we’ve done many integrations with other softwares and also many software companies have connected with their development work to previously created software from us.
